mapper.sql: select id, company_website, company_name, short_name, country_region, sea_type, publicleads_groups_id, packet_id, stage_id, rating, customer_no_type, customer_no, phone_prefix, phone, timezone, scale, fax, address, company_remarks, company_logo, focus_flag, last_contacted_at, last_followup_at, del_flag, create_id, create_by, create_time, update_id, update_by, update_time from customer_customer
mapper.select: where id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'

select id, company_website, company_name, short_name, country_region, sea_type, publicleads_groups_id, packet_id, stage_id, rating, customer_no_type, customer_no, phone_prefix, phone, timezone, scale, fax, address, company_remarks, company_logo, focus_flag, last_contacted_at, last_followup_at, del_flag, create_id, create_by, create_time, update_id, update_by, update_time from customer_customer left join sys_user where id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
select id from customer_customer where del_flag = '0' and sea_type = 1
select dept_id as deptId from sys_user where user_id = #{userId} and del_flag = '0'

SELECT c.id, c.last_contacted_at AS lastContactedAt, cfup.user_id AS userId FROM customer_customer c LEFT JOIN customer_customer_follow_up_personnel cfup ON cfup.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN customer_customer_segment cs ON cs.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN customer_segment s ON s.id = cs.segment_id WHERE cs.segment_id = #{segmentId} and c.sea_type = 1

SELECT r.role_id AS roleId, r.data_scope AS dataScope, rd.dept_id AS roleDeptId FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_dept rd ON r.role_id = rd.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
select user_id as userId, nick_name as nickName, dept_id as deptId from sys_user where status = 0 and del_flag = '0'
select dept_id from sys_dept where del_flag = '0' and parent_id = #{deptId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM customer_customer WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo} AND del_flag = '0'
select value as id, label as name from base_country
select value as id, label as name from base_timezone
select count(*) from customer_customer where company_name = #{companyName} and del_flag = '0'
select count(*) from customer_customer where id != #{id} and company_name = #{companyName} and del_flag = '0'

select cc.id as customerId, cc.company_name as companyName, cc.rating, count(1) as count from customer_customer cc left join customer_customer_follow_up_personnel ccfup on cc.id = ccfup.customer_id left join customer_customer_contact ccc on cc.id = ccc.customer_id left join mailbox_task_email mte on ccc.email = mte.fromer where cc.del_flag = '0' and ccc.del_flag = '0' and mte.del_flag = '0' and ccfup.user_id = #{userId} group by cc.id, cc.company_name, rating

select cc.id as customerId, cc.company_name as companyName, cc.publicleads_groups_id as publicleadsGroupsId, count(1) as count from customer_customer cc left join customer_customer_follow_up_personnel ccfup on cc.id = ccfup.customer_id left join customer_customer_contact ccc on cc.id = ccc.customer_id left join mailbox_task_email mte on ccc.email = mte.fromer where cc.del_flag = '0' and ccc.del_flag = '0' and mte.del_flag = '0' and ccfup.user_id = #{userId} group by cc.id, cc.company_name, cc.publicleads_groups_id order by cc.create_time desc

select cc.id as customerId, cc.company_name as companyName, cc.packet_id as packetId, count(1) as count from customer_customer cc left join customer_customer_follow_up_personnel ccfup on cc.id = ccfup.customer_id left join customer_customer_contact ccc on cc.id = ccc.customer_id left join mailbox_task_email mte on ccc.email = mte.fromer where cc.del_flag = '0' and ccc.del_flag = '0' and mte.del_flag = '0' and ccfup.user_id = #{userId} group by cc.id, cc.company_name, cc.packet_id order by cc.create_time desc

select cc.id as customerId, cc.company_name as companyName, ccs.source_id as sourceId, count(DISTINCT cc.id) as count from customer_customer cc left join customer_customer_follow_up_personnel ccfup on cc.id = ccfup.customer_id left join customer_customer_contact ccc on cc.id = ccc.customer_id left join mailbox_task_email mte on ccc.email = mte.fromer left join customer_customer_source ccs ON cc.id = ccs.customer_id where cc.del_flag = '0' and ccc.del_flag = '0' and mte.del_flag = '0' and ccfup.user_id = #{userId} group by cc.id, cc.company_name, ccs.source_id

select cc.id as customerId, cc.company_name as companyName, cc.last_contacted_at as lastContactedAt, count(DISTINCT cc.id) as count from customer_customer cc left join customer_customer_follow_up_personnel ccfup on cc.id = ccfup.customer_id left join customer_customer_contact ccc on cc.id = ccc.customer_id left join mailbox_task_email mte on ccc.email = mte.fromer left join customer_customer_source ccs ON cc.id = ccs.customer_id where cc.del_flag = '0' and ccc.del_flag = '0' and mte.del_flag = '0' and ccfup.user_id = #{userId} group by cc.id, cc.company_name, cc.last_contacted_at order by cc.last_contacted_at desc
